nodes.text: The World thrasher was a massive armored vehicle developed by the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. Capable of uprooting or incinerating trees, smashing boulders, flattening hills, and even burrowing through mountains, World Thrashers were used to clear a path for incoming ground troops during planetary invasions. Though slow and ponderous, they were nevertheless extremely effective at their job. A large number of World Thrashers were deployed during the Assault on Odessen in 3630 BBY.
World thrashers appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VIII: End Times."
